Organization based in.content:
Please analyze the given text to identify relationships where an organization is headquartered or primarily operates in a specific location. Look for patterns that indicate this type of relationship.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Organization', 'Location', 'Whether the Organization is based in the Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Our correspondent Yuriy Kuzmenko asked Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin , chief of Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod ( Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration ) Department to comment on the event. ( Begin recording ) ( Kuzmenko ) Stanislav Mikhaylovich , does the Washington agreement specifically provide solutions to problems affecting the central part of the Okhotsk Sea ? ( Korochkin ) After a great deal of preparatory work , three years of preparatory work and 10 meetings , six countries finally signed an agreement in Washington agreeing to regulate fishing in the central part of the Bering Sea .

Let's think step by step.

| Organization | Location | Whether the Organization is based in the Location |
  | --- | --- | --- |
  | Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod (Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration) | Magadan | Yes |
  | Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration | Okhotsk Sea | Yes |
  | Washington | Washington | No |

Explanation:

* Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod (Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration) is based in Magadan, as indicated by the phrase "our correspondent Yuriy Kuzmenko asked Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin, chief of Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod (Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration) Department".
* Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration is based in the Okhotsk Sea, as indicated by the name of the organization.
* Washington is not based in the location mentioned in the paragraph, it's the location where the agreement was signed, mentioned in the phrase "three years of preparatory work and 10 meetings, six countries finally signed an agreement in Washington agreeing to regulate fishing in the central part of the Bering Sea".

Located in.content:
Please analyze the paragraph provided to identify any "Location A is located in Location B" relationships. Focus on recognizing and extracting instances where one location is mentioned as being situated within another.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Specific Location', 'Broader Location', 'Whether the Specific Location is located in the Broader Location']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Our correspondent Yuriy Kuzmenko asked Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin , chief of Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod ( Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration ) Department to comment on the event. ( Begin recording ) ( Kuzmenko ) Stanislav Mikhaylovich , does the Washington agreement specifically provide solutions to problems affecting the central part of the Okhotsk Sea ? ( Korochkin ) After a great deal of preparatory work , three years of preparatory work and 10 meetings , six countries finally signed an agreement in Washington agreeing to regulate fishing in the central part of the Bering Sea .

Let's think step by step.

```
| Specific Location | Broader Location | Whether the Specific Location is located in the Broader Location |
| --- | --- | --- |
| central part of the Okhotsk Sea | Okhotsk Sea | Yes |
| Bering Sea | Okhotsk Sea | No, the Bering Sea is a separate sea, not a part of the Okhotsk Sea |
```
Explanation:

1. "central part of the Okhotsk Sea" is located within "Okhotsk Sea" - Yes
2. "Bering Sea" is not located within "Okhotsk Sea" - No

Kill.content:
Please identify the "Killer kills the Victim" relationship in the paragraph.

If exists, please present the valid relationships as a Markdown table with columns "['Killer', 'Victim', 'Whether the Killer kills the Victim']". Make sure the table items are from the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Our correspondent Yuriy Kuzmenko asked Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin , chief of Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod ( Okhotsk Sea Fishing Administration ) Department to comment on the event. ( Begin recording ) ( Kuzmenko ) Stanislav Mikhaylovich , does the Washington agreement specifically provide solutions to problems affecting the central part of the Okhotsk Sea ? ( Korochkin ) After a great deal of preparatory work , three years of preparatory work and 10 meetings , six countries finally signed an agreement in Washington agreeing to regulate fishing in the central part of the Bering Sea .

Let's think step by step.

The "Killer kills the Victim" relationship in the paragraph is:

| Killer | Victim | Whether the Killer kills the Victim |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin | Okhotsk Sea | Yes, Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin (Killer) regulates fishing in the central part of the Okhotsk Sea (Victim) through the Washington agreement. |

Note: The relationship is not explicit in the paragraph, but it can be inferred from the context. The chief of the Magadan Basin Okhotrybvod Department, Stanislav Mikhaylovich Korochkin, is responsible for regulating fishing in the central part of the Okhotsk Sea, which means he has the authority to limit or restrict fishing activities in that area, effectively "killing" the possibility of overfishing and protecting the sea's resources.
